dialogue.name: SIMPKIN
dialogue.text: Have you come to listen to the silken strings of Simpkin, traveling troubadour and master minstrel? No?

dialogue.name: SIMPKIN
dialogue.text: You do, however, have the look of one who lives life on the road─and on the subject of wondrous wanderings and the musical expression thereof, I do mayhap have some small wisdom to offer.

dialogue.name: SIMPKIN
dialogue.text: When I suddenly find my heart stirred by some spectacle of nature or inspiring act of derring-do, I simply let the emotion of the moment flow through my fingers and into my harp. I've found no sound to be as achingly beautiful as one born from that instant of genuine joy or wistful sadness.

dialogue.name: SIMPKIN
dialogue.text: You need no special training or knowledge to give voice to the music of the heart─only a willingness to play the score as it writes itself across your soul.

dialogue.name: SIMPKIN
dialogue.text: If you can accomplish such a surrender, then you will have created a piece unique unto yourself. And what melody could be more precious!?

dialogue.name: SIMPKIN
dialogue.text: Aye, I knew from the moment I laid eyes upon you─here is a womanman whose spirit begs for instrumental interpretation. Pray release your inhibitions, and favor the world with your performance!

dialogue.name: SIMPKIN
dialogue.text: To begin, you should simply play whichever notes catch your fancy. Let whimsy carry you up and down the scales, revel in the soaring heights and plunging depths, until you find a song which resonates with your being.

dialogue.name: SIMPKIN
dialogue.text: Painted with the experience of your adventures, the timbre and tone will be yours and yours alone. Ah, I wonder what manner of music will fill the air... May the wind catch your composition, and deliver it unto my covetous ear!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You have learned “Perform”! When playing as a bard, Performance Actions can be found in the Actions & Traits window, accessed under Character in the main menu.

dialogue.name: SIMPKIN
dialogue.text: I understand─the courage for such surrender does not come easily. My harp and I shall be in town for some time, so feel free to visit me again should you choose to pursue my musical teachings.

dialogue.name: SIMPKIN
dialogue.text: You have a certain air about you. A musical air. Have you ever considered taking up an instrument...?

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: In order to undertake this quest, you must change your current job to bard.

obj.n: A Song of Bards and Bowmen
